name: Operation F.A.T.E. Demo
description:
Hi. I'm an independent developer who likes to develop and perfect games for optimal enjoyment and replayability (this is quite important to me). I like to make tutorial levels as short as possible (unless they are deliberately engaging), and make sure dialogue doesn't run too long. It's nice to meet you!

I handle all the programming, scriptwriting, artwork, music, etc. so I greatly appreciate any donations you may give. And with enough donations, I will be able to finish the game and add more features which may enhance the game's overall experience.

Thanks.
